name: Michalis Spiros
story: Alexandros grew up in Greece and always had a passion for serving his country. After completing his military service, he joined the armed forces as a career soldier. He quickly rose through the ranks due to his impressive leadership skills and tactical knowledge. As a Team Leader, Alexandros is respected by his subordinates and feared by his enemies. He is determined to carry out his missions to the best of his ability, no matter the cost.
